item.title: Biden's cancer diagnosis raises fresh questions about his health in White House
item.description: The news that he has "aggressive" prostate cancer has some medics asking why it was not detected sooner.

item.title: French police launch prison hunt for mini Chinese-made phones
item.description: The phones, no bigger than a cigarette-lighter, were being used to mastermind crimes from inside jail.

item.title: Zelensky accuses Russia of 'buying time' to stall truce talks
item.description: It follows Donald Trump saying Russia and Ukraine will "immediately" start negotiating, after a two-hour phone call with Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Spain clamps down on Airbnb as tourism backlash returns for summer
item.description: The Spanish government calls for the removal of almost 66,000 property listings saying they breach tourism rules.

item.title: Iran's Khamenei doubts US nuclear talks will lead to agreement
item.description: "We don't think it will lead to any outcome," the supreme leader warns, saying the US is making "outrageous" demands on uranium enrichment.
